doc:
Emma Walton Hamilton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emma_Walton_Hamilton 0 Emma Katherine Walton Hamilton (née Walton; 27 November 1962) is a British actress, theatrical director and children's book author. She is currently an instructor in the MFA program at SUNY-Stony Brook Southampton, where she serves as Director of the Southampton Children's Literature Fellows program and YAWP, the Young Artists and Writers Project. Emma_Katherine_Walton_Hamilton ( née_Walton ; 27_November_1962 ) is a_British_actress , theatrical_director and children 's_book_author .
